mapper.select: select r.name from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join t_role r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.id=#{id}

select distinct m.*, CONCAT(CONCAT_WS('(',m.name,m.code),')') nameCode from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on u.id= ur.user_id left join t_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join t_role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id left join t_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where u.id=#{id} and m.id is not null order by m.priority asc

select u.id,u.name, u.usercode, u.create_time, u.avatar, u.description, u.status, u.phone, u.email, u.sex, ur.role_id roleId from t_user u left join t_user_role ur on (u.id = ur.user_id) where u.id = #{id}

select u.id, u.usercode, u.name, u.create_time, u.avatar, u.phone, u.sex, u.status, u.description,u.user_type, case when t.role_type=1 then '1' else '0' end tenantAdmin from t_user u left join (select ur.user_id,ur.role_id,r.role_type from t_user_role ur,t_role r where ur.role_id = r.id and r.role_type=1) t on u.id = t.user_id where u.id not in(select ut.user_id from t_user_tenant ut) and u.user_type <> 1
and (u.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') or u.usercode like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and u.status='1'

SELECT u.`name`, IFNULL(SUM(o.`transfer_accounts_amount`),0) amount FROM (SELECT id, `name` FROM t_user WHERE department = #{departmentId} and statistic = '是' ) u LEFT JOIN ( select * from t_order io where 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(io.deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dealDateBegin},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(io.deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{dealDateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d') ) o ON u.id = o.`user_id` where 1=1 GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY amount DESC

SELECT u.`name`, IFNULL(SUM(o.`transfer_accounts_amount`),0) amount FROM (SELECT id,`name` FROM t_user where statistic = '是' ) u LEFT JOIN ( select * from t_order io where 1=1 AND DATE_FORMAT(io.deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dealDateBegin},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(io.deal_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{dealDateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d') ) o ON u.id = o.`user_id` where 1=1 GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY amount DESC
